text: @narendramodi @PIB_India @nsitharaman @PMOIndia assume there is a mystic remedy for COVID19 by July 2020. Are we making COVID19 as an excuse to privatize India. And we do not see any end to the miseries of the people who stranded around india for 45 days due to an unscheduled lockdown. @SitaramYechury
